description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Sketchy Tower Defense offers classic tower defense gameplay with unique uncluttered graphical style that provides endless hours of fun. Play a variety of fun levels in single player, two player offline co-op, or two player offline competitive mode!
